attributes.action: Assure Uwe Boll movies will never be released in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The German director Uwe Boll makes some of the worst movies in the history of film, all based on video games. Alone in the Dark, House of the Dead, Bloodrayne and now Postal which features jokes about 9/11. Stop this man from polluting our world with his junk.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
